content:
IDefineEvent Interface

Definition

Defines extra functionality that is needed by an active script host.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("D1A19408-BB6B-43eb-BB6F-E7CF6AF047D7")]
public interface IDefineEvent

Methods

AddEvent(String,Int32)

Used by an active script host to define an event.

public object AddEvent (string code, int startLine);
code
String

The code that contains the event.

startLine
Int32

The line number where the code starts.

Returns
Object

The event, if it was successfully added.
